removeSelectedAndDeleteContent: Kuraho abakoresha no gusiba ibikorwa byabo byose:
emailAlreadyRegisterred: Ntushobora gushyiraho iyi aderesi ya imeli kuko isanzwe ikoreshwa.
cantDisconnectFromFacebookWithoutValidEm: Ntushobora gukatira Facebook Login udafite aderesi ya imeli yemewe
cantDisconnectFromSamlWithoutValidEmail: Ntushobora gukatira Electronic ID login udafite aderesi ya imeli yemewe
areYouSureYouWantToDisconnectSamlLogin: Urahisemo gukatira konti yawe kuri Electronic ID Login? Ntuzashobora kwinjira ukoresheje ID yawe ya elektroniki nyuma y'iyi gikorwa!
areYouSureYouWantToDisconnectFacebookLog: Urahisemo gukatira konti yawe kuri Facebook Login? Ntuzashobora kwinjira ukoresheje Facebook nyuma y'iyi gikorwa!
forceSecureSamlLoginInfo: Kugira ngo winjire muri iri tsinda ugomba kwinjira ukoresheje ikarita y'umutekano ya elektronike kugira ngo wemeze ijwi rimwe kuri buri muntu. Kanda hasi kugira ngo winjire.
areYouSureYouWantToAnonymizeUser: Uratekereza ko ushaka guhindura konti yawe kuba iy'umwirondoro utazwi?
areYouReallySureYouWantToAnonymizeUser: Uratekereza neza ko ushaka guhindura konti yawe kuba iy'umwirondoro utazwi? Ibyanditswe byawe byose, amanota, ibitekerezo n'ibyemezo bizahinduka bitazwi
anonymizeUserInfo: Iyo uhinduye konti yawe kuba iy'umwirondoro utazwi, ibyanditswe byawe byose, amanota n'amajwi bizahinduka bitazwi kandi ntibizasubira kuri wowe.
deleteUserInfo: Iyo usibye konti yawe, ibyanditswe byawe byose, amanota n'amajwi bizasibwa burundu kandi nta buryo uzabona bwo kugarura amakuru. Niba warashinze imiryango cyangwa amatsinda, ayo azahinduka ay'umwirondoro utazwi.
deleteOrAnonymizeUser: Siba cyangwa Hindura Konti Kuba Iy'umwirondoro Utazwi
anonymizePostContentDone: Guhindura ibyanditswe kuba bitazwi byarangiye kuri
anonymizePostContentError: Ikosa mu guhindura ibyanditswe kuba bitazwi kuri
deletePostContentError: Ikosa risiba amanota n'ibikubiye muri byo kuri
postAnonymizeContentConfirmation: IMPURUZA: Ugiye guhisha uyu muposti n'amanota yose. Bishobora gutwara umunota umwe, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?
postDeleteContentConfirmation: IMPURUZA: Ugiye gusiba amanota yose, ibikubiye muri byo & amajwi kuri uyu muposti. Bishobora gutwara umunota umwe, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?
groupAnonymizeConfirmation: IMPURUZA: Ugiye guhisha amapositi yose n'amanota muri iri tsinda. Bizakorwa mu minsi 7 bitanga amahirwe ku bahanzi b'ibikubiye kubisiba, bazoherezwa email. Urashaka gukomeza?
groupDeleteContentConfirmation: IMPURUZA: Ugiye gusiba amapositi yose n'amanota muri iri tsinda. Bishobora gutwara umunota umwe, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?

communityDeleteContentConfirmation: IMPURUZA: Ugiye gusiba amatsinda yose muri iyi komini. Ibi bishobora gutwara umunota umwe, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?
communityAnonymizeConfirmation: IMPURUZA: Ugiye guhindura amatsinda yose muri iyi komini ngo abure umwirondoro. Ibi bizakorwa mu minsi 7 bitanga amahirwe ku bakoze ibikorwa byo gusiba ibyabo, bazoherezwa email. Urashika gukomeza?
anonymizeCommunityContent: Hindura amatsinda yose ngo abure umwirondoro
communityDeleteConfirmation: IMPURUZA! Nusiba komini yose, amatsinda yayo, ibyanditswe n'ibitekerezo by'impuha bizasibwa. Urashaka gukomeza?
